summary: A Django test suite that verifies core request handling behavior, including response initiation, script-name extraction, signal emission, per-request transaction management, middleware interaction, handling of malformed paths, multipart and non-ASCII data, as well as custom error handling and simple view simulations.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the application's request processing, middleware, transaction handling, and error response mechanisms, providing confidence for stable production deployment.
